verbs.description: [ARG1: man] [V: arrested] [ARG2: in connection with suspected explosive packages] aventura fla federal authorities on friday captured a florida man with a criminal history and a fervor for president donald trump and accused him of sending at least 13 mail bombs to prominent democrats capping a nationwide search in a case that spread fear of election - season violence washington time warner company
